text: allah irakki aruliya (vetat)tinpalum, ittutarinpalum varunkal" ena avarkalukkuk kurappattal, "enkalutaiya tantaiyar (mutataiyar)kalai nankal e(nta markkat)til kantomo atuve enkalukkup potumanatu" enru avarkal kurukirarkal; enna! Avarkalutaiya tantaiyar (mutataiyarkal) onrum ariyatavarkalakavum, nervaliyil natakkatavarkalakavum iruntaluma? (Avarkalaip pinparruvarkal)
